name: piwigo
tagline: A self-hosted platform for managing photo galleries
description: Piwigo is a self-hosted photo gallery and management platform. It includes tagging, albums, metadata, and plugins for organizing and sharing large image collections.

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Create hierarchical album structures to organize photos by events, dates, or themes

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload multiple photos simultaneously with drag-and-drop or FTP for large collections

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply tags to photos for flexible categorization and cross-album organization

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Control access with user groups, album-level permissions, and privacy settings

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with hundreds of community plugins for features and integrations

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Choose from multiple themes or create custom designs to match your brand

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find photos by tags, albums, dates, ratings, or EXIF data with advanced filters
